metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## Count of Users over time
---

This graphs counts the # of user sessions over time. "},"name":"text - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ITPC_CTX_Session_CL
| where ConnectionState_s =="Active"
| summarize dcount(SessionHash_s)  by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)   // bin gives you the count of the distinct sessions in intervals of 15 minutes 
| render timechart  
","size":1,"aggregation":5,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","chartSettings":{"seriesLabelSettings":[{"seriesName":"dcount_SessionHash_s","label":"User Count"}]}},"name":"query - 2"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## User Count Every 15 Minutes"},"name":"text - 0"}]},"name":"group - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"ITPC_CTX_Session_CL
| where ConnectionState_s =="Active"
| summarize dcount(SessionHash_s)  by bin(TimeGenerated, 15m)   // bin gives you the count of the distinct sessions in intervals of 15 minutes 
","size":3,"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"TimeGenerated","sortOrder":2}],"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"TimeGenerated"},{"columnId":"dcount_SessionHash_s","label":"User Count"}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"TimeGenerated","sortOrder":2}]},"name":"query - 3"}],"isLocked":false}
